name: Healthy Aussie Bites™
author: sarahjanes
summary: My take on Aussie Bites™ with a little more added to them. Use a mix of chopped dried fruits such as raisins, dates, figs, cranberries, etc.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Mix whole wheat flour, oats, dried fruit, brown sugar, coconut, sunflower seeds, flaxseed meal, chia seeds, vanilla extract, and salt together in a large bowl
Melt butter and honey together in a microwave-safe glass or ceramic bowl in 30-second intervals, stirring after each interval, 1 to 2 minutes
Dissolve baking soda in hot water in a small bowl; add to the butter mixture and mix well
Pour butter mixture over flour mixture; mix well to combine
Spoon tablespoons of mixture into ungreased mini muffin pans and flatten tops slightly
Bake in the preheated oven until golden, about 10 minutes
Transfer to wire racks to cool
